about_the_game: The demo build of SCP - Containment Breach Reborn is several builds behind the private early access version. It has been published and will be updated with the intent of transparency, and will be lacking in content. Thank you for your patience.
detailed_description: The demo build of SCP - Containment Breach Reborn is several builds behind the private early access version. It has been published and will be updated with the intent of transparency, and will be lacking in content. Thank you for your patience.

name: SCP - Containment Breach Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or AMD Phenom II X4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1460 MB available space
  • VR Support: VR Supported
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may differ between builds

short_description: The demo build of SCP - Containment Breach Reborn is several builds behind the private early access version. It has been published and will be updated with the intent of transparency, and will be lacking in content. Thank you for your patience.
